title: Regional movements in UK and Mexico

content.question: Which of the following best explains why regional identities have led to independence movements in the United Kingdom but not in Mexico?

choices.label: More extreme differences in the level of economic development between regions in the United Kingdom.
A history of the regions’ existence as separate states in the United Kingdom.
More recent experience of civil war in the United Kingdom.
A federal system that contains an explicit constitutional mechanism for secession in the United Kingdom.

content.answer: A history of the regions’ existence as separate states in the United Kingdom.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
